content.headingSubtitle: High-level examples of how we support secure, structured delivery.

cases.title: Case Study 1 — SSDLC Implementation
cases.body: A technology company required a more secure development process. We implemented an SSDLC framework, introduced secure coding practices, and integrated automated scans into their pipeline.
cases.result: Improved resilience and faster release cycles.

cases.title: Case Study 2 — Cybersecurity Risk Reduction
cases.body: A financial client needed to address repeated security audit findings. We improved their controls, updated policies, and strengthened their cloud security posture.
cases.result: Passed compliance audit and reduced risk exposure.

cases.title: Case Study 3 — Project Recovery
cases.body: A major system deployment was at risk of failure. We stabilized the project, corrected the schedule, redefined requirements, and delivered under a revised plan.
cases.result: Successful implementation and positive stakeholder feedback.
